node.title: Infowars host Alex Jones liable for damages over Sandy Hook shooting 'hoax' conspiracy
node.alt: A man in a suit speaks
node.description: A US judge finds Mr Jones liable by default in a defamation case brought by parents of children killed in the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting.
node.content:
["A US judge has found Infowars host Alex Jones liable by default in a defamation case brought by parents of children killed in the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting in 2012.", "Mr Jones had claimed the massacre was a hoax.", "The ruling by Connecticut Judge Barbara Bellis \u2014\u00a0who cited Mr Jones's refusal to abide by court rulings or turn over evidence \u2014\u00a0means a jury will determine how much in damages Mr Jones should pay to the families.", "Shortly after the judge's decision, Mr Jones claimed he had been deprived of a fair trial.", "\"They know they don't have a case for damages. And so the judge is saying you are guilty of damages, now a jury decides how guilty you are. It's not guilty until proven guilty.\"", "", "
Families of the victims say\u00a0they have been subjected to harassment and death threats from Jones's followers because of the Infowars conspiracy.(Reuters: Lucas Jackson)
", "
Default judgement after failure to turn over documents
", "Judge Barbara Bellis took the rare step of issuing a default judgement in the case.", "She said Mr Jones and his companies, Infowars and Free Speech Systems, had failed to turn over documents, including records that might have showed how, and if, they had profited from spreading misinformation about the school shooting and other mass killings.", "Mr Jones' lawyers have been contacted for comment.\u00a0", "Previously lawyers for Mr Jones have denied violating court rules on document disclosure and have asked that Judge Bellis be removed from the case, alleging she has not been impartial.", "It wasn't clear if they planned to appeal the default judgement.", "The ruling has the same outcome as a jury determining the case in favour of the families.", "A jury will now determine the damages.", "", "
Broadcaster Alex Jones has since acknowledged the school shooting did occur.(Reuters: Adrees Latif)
", "
Families subjected to death threats after conspiracy push
", "In December 2012, 20 first-grade children\u00a0and six teachers were killed by a shooter.", "The gunman, Adam Lanza, 20, killed his mother at their Newtown home before the shooting, and then killed himself at the school as police arrived.", "", "
Alex Jones has been sanctioned for violating numerous court orders.\u00a0(Reuters: Michelle McLoughlin)
", "Not long after, the shooting was portrayed on Jones' Infowars show as a hoax involving actors aimed at increasing gun control.", "Mr Jones has since acknowledged the school shooting did occur.", "Families of the victims said they had\u00a0been subjected to harassment and death threats from Mr Jones's followers because of the hoax conspiracy pushed on Infowars.", "They sued Mr Jones and his companies for defamation and infliction of emotional distress.", "The hearing on damages before a jury is expected to be held next year.", "\"What's clear from Judge Bellis' ruling is that Alex Jones and the Jones defendants have engaged in a long, continuous course of misconduct, in this case designed to prevent the plaintiffs from getting evidence about Mr\u00a0Jones's business and about his motives for publishing lies about them and their families,\" said Christopher Mattei, a lawyer for relatives of eight of the victims.", "", "
Alex Jones says he has been deprived of a fair trial.(Reuters: jim Urquhart)
", "
Ruling follows similar defamation judgements\u00a0
", "A Texas judge recently issued similar rulings against Mr Jones in three defamation cases brought by Sandy Hook families in that state, finding Mr Jones liable for damages after defaulting him and his companies for not turning over documents.", "Hearings on damages also were ordered.", "In one of the cases, a Texas judge ordered Mr Jones to pay $US100,000 ($136,000) in legal fees and refused to dismiss the case.", "In the three ongoing Connecticut cases, Mr Jones has previously been sanctioned for violating numerous orders to turn over documents and for an angry outburst on his web show.\u00a0", "A judge also barred Mr Jones from filing a motion to dismiss the case, a ruling that was upheld after being appealed all the way to the US\u00a0Supreme Court in April.", "ABC/AP\u00a0"]
